## Data
The data was taken from [this Kaggle Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/yasserh/song-popularity-dataset). It used the Spotify API to gain data on each song's popularity and other factors in the dataset. I also used Chat GPT for help in creating this website.

## Kaggle
Kaggle is a data science community with platforms for data science competitions, comphrehensive datasets, and tutorials and free AI/ML models for users to develop skills in data science.

## Spotify
Spotify is the leading streaming music service. It has about as many users as ___ has plays on Spotify (~615 million).
